welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lorain, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and welcoming community. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yala's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Yala's Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Lorain.

restaurants.name: Diso's Bistro at All Nations
restaurants.description: Diso's Bistro at All Nations is a new american restaurant located in Lorain.

restaurants.name: Gyros & More
restaurants.description: Gyros & More is a greek restaurant located in Lorain.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Lorain.

restaurants.name: Taco Bell
restaurants.description: Taco Bell is a fast food restaurant located in Lorain.
restaurants.address: 3671 Oberlin Ave (at W 37th St), Lorain, OH 44053

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves primarily domestic flights operated by United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for both domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
